title: People with disability 'blossom like a flower' on community radio
description: A community radio station in Alice Springs is becoming a breeding ground for new, diverse voices by giving people with disability a platform to broadcast.
content:
Across Australia, community radio stations act as hubs of culture and connection, reflecting the diversity of the communities they serve, powered by a legion of loving volunteers.
